name: Project Skid (Drift Game)
description:
NOTE: FOR NOW YOU MUST PLAY IN FULL SCREEN WITH A 1080P MONITOR FOR THE UI ELEMENTS TO SHOW UP!

Features:

- Smooth Drift Physics

- Very nice drift park map

- Clean Menu

A drifting game I started about 1 week ago. Note: the graphics are worse on the web player version! The exe version is going to be released in the near future! :)

Plans:

- fix ui

- add more maps/cars

- add customization

- enable drift points

- muiltiplayer
